output:
1b Heavenly Father, you call us to prepare for the coming of your Son.
2 Forgive us our unreadiness to receive him.
3 Kyrie eleison! Lord, have mercy!
4 Lord Jesus, proclaimed by John the Baptist, help us also to prepare your way.
3 Kyrie eleison! Lord, have mercy!
5 Holy Spirit, you speak through the prophets. Make us attentive to hear your word.
3 Kyrie eleison! Lord, have mercy!
